title: Special Topics in Screening Race/Ethnicity, Gender and Sexuality
description: Exploring both Hollywood and international filmmaking, an exploration of screen representations with attention to race/ethnicity, gender, and sexuality in different historical and linguistic contexts. Historical periods may extend from silent, through wartime and cold war, to contemporary era of globalization. LTCS 172 and LTCS 172GS may be taken for credit for a combined total of three times.
